TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 將屬性型別提供給繫結基礎結構。

span.span: Provides a property type to the bind infrastructure.

summary.span: 它是由包含變數型別之屬性的活動所實作，其中的型別會視其他活動設定而改變。

span.span: It is implemented by activities that contain a property of variable type, where the type can vary depending on other activity settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 這個介面允許父活動與兩個屬性產生關聯，並為繫結基礎結構指示驗證繫結時使用的型別。This interface allows the parent activity to associate two properties and indicate to the bind infrastructure the type to be used in validating the bind. 例如，您可以讓活動具有 `TypeProperty` 和 `ValueProperty` 等兩個屬性，其中 `TypeProperty` 會指定 `ValueProperty` 之值的有效型別。For example, you might have an activity with two properties, `TypeProperty` and `ValueProperty`, where `TypeProperty` specifies a valid type for the value of `ValueProperty`. 在此狀況下，父活動會實作 介面。In such a case, the parent activity implements the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes GetAccessType(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider, string propertyName) cil managed
Public Function GetAccessType (serviceProvider As IServiceProvider, propertyName As String) As AccessTypes

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 實作 以便在必要時提供設計階段服務之存取的物件。

span.span: An object that implements to provide access to design time services if they are needed.

summary.span: 傳回指定之屬性的存取類型。

span.span: Returns the access type for the specified property.

returns.span: 代表屬性存取層級的 列舉值。

span.span: An enumeration value that denotes the access level of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在編譯時間用來驗證屬性之間是否正確繫結程序。Used at compile time to validate if the properties are correctly bound to one other. 如果沒有這個介面，會直接從屬性 getter/setter 推斷這項資訊。Without this interface, this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 實作 的物件，該提供者可在需要設計階段服務時提供相關存取權。

span.span: An object that implements to provide access to design-time services if they are needed.
Returns the of the specified property.

returns.span: 屬性的 ，其名稱會作為 參數傳遞。

span.span: The for the property whose name is passed as the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在編譯時間用來驗證屬性之間是否正確繫結程序。Used at compile time to validate if the properties are correctly bound to one other.
